title: ===The best class for  jungling===
body:
I was wondering if there was a specific class that is best suited to jungling.  So far the only class I have tried for jungling are assassin and they worried out quite well. 

Please leave a comment on which class is the best suited for jungling

replies.body:
I'm   a naut/zac main and I getting into sej and volibear and I'm finding all of them work extremely well ounce they get past their weak-ish lvl1-3 stage in the jungle. They offer heaps of utility, generally allot of tankyness and a surprising amount of damage considering they are all utility tanks in this role.
This is just my opinion based on my play-style :P

Fighters with enough early game power and/or speed are also having a great time as the extended camp re-spawn timers are excruciatingly painful to deal with if you counter all of their camps. 
Hec, Rek-sai Lee sin and udyr work very well

And then theirs the already mentioned fiddle. The infinite sustain ultimate glass cannon in this game. With a temporary mobility boots purchase your ganks become very very scary, ounce you hit six however those boots become far less valuable.  Ridiculously strong if you've got the mindset of a yolo player. If not and you spend allot of time considering whether you should ult in or not, than fiddle is not for u
Paladin jungle is pretty op, or deathrattle hunter.
Fid is op in new jungle

Fighters do well in the current jungle but some tanks can work (not recommended)
but really depends on your playstyle too.
I main {{champion:72}} Skarner so thats my view to the new jungle...
Fighters work well like Rengar(he can be hard though pink smite is probably the best he has OP damage), Xin Zhao, Rek'Sai and Udyr

People with lots of health region *warwick* can last long as he can sustain longer than other junglers in the first 1-3 minutes.

tl;dr Fiddlesticks & Warwick are good.

~~Because the new jungle is like baron in every camp.~~
